hypothesis_content.title: BTC Dominance Reversal Momentum Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC dominance (BTC.D) rises >2% in a single day during a NEUTRAL/BEAR regime while total crypto market cap declines, the top 3 altcoins by 24h volume (excluding stablecoins) that showed relative strength (price decline < half of BTC's decline) will outperform BTC by >8% over the next 72 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sharp BTC dominance spikes in weak markets often represent panic rotation to 'safety' rather than organic BTC strength. Alts showing relative resilience during these flushes are likely to rebound aggressively when dominance mean-reverts, as traders rotate back into risk.
entry_conditions: Total crypto market cap decreases same period
Identify top 3 altcoins by 24h volume with price decline < (BTC decline * 0.5)
Entry at next hourly candle open
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Mean altcoin alpha vs BTC ≤2% across historical dominance spike events (>1.5% daily increase).
